Sends an OTP code to the specified email address.

## Import

```ts
import { AuthClient } from "@alchemy/auth";
```

## Parameters

### params

`SendEmailOtpParams`

- The parameters for sending the OTP

### params.email

`string`

- The email address to send the OTP to

## Returns

`Promise<void>`
A promise that resolves when the OTP is sent
